title: My Glucose Monitor Can Drive Me Crazy---and I Wouldn't Have It Any Other Way
description: Medical wearables allow us to continually monitor our bodies. It can be maddening, but it’s well worth the price.

title: Tesla Board View That Elon Musk Is Irreplaceable Emerged in Pay Trial
description: The directors’ desire to keep the serial entrepreneur focused on the car maker contributed to the pursuit of a multibillion-dollar equity grant.

title: When Kids Exclude Peers From Group Chats and Texts, Is It Bullying?
description: Teen cliques are always in flux, and kids left out of online conversations can feel hurt. When the exclusion is intentional, teachers and pediatricians say it’s a form of digital bullying.

title: TikTok Is Still Hiring as Competitors Shed Jobs
description: The social-media company has said it would add 3,000 engineers and plans to boost head count at its hub in Silicon Valley.

title: Debunking the Myth of the Tech Gods
description: Society’s belief that startup founders possess extraordinary powers is harmful to everyday workers and investors.

title: They Lived Together, Worked Together and Lost Billions Together: Inside Sam Bankman-Fried's Doomed FTX Empire
description: The emerging picture of what went wrong suggests the crypto empire was a mess almost from the start, with few boundaries, financial or personal
